alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:57AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Nuckolls and Thayer Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 557 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Byron, or 19 miles northwest of Belleville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Deshler around 605 AM CDT. Chester around 610 AM CDT. Hebron around 615 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Gilead and Alexandria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for south central Nebraska.
